0.1.name: wordpress/windows-azure-auto-scaling-plugin
0.1.description:
NOTE: The wp-admin interface for this plugin still needs some sprucing up. I (blobaugh) no longer have access to Windows Azure to continue improvement. If you need this plugin consider contributing to it, or getting me another Windows Azure subscription to continue development.

The Windows Azure cloud platform provides some very powerful scaling ability, however natively Windows Azure does not know how to scale applications. This plugin teaches WordPress how to scale your website on the Windows Azure platform and take advantage of the full power of the cloud.
